Setelah sampe di hotel dengan emosi, penuh perdebatan ahirnya mereka bilang untuk pindah hotel dengan harga yg sama diantar dengan shuttle hotel mereka, oke kita bisa terima.

Check in time hotelnya jem 2 siang, saya dateng jem setengah 4 kamarnya baru 1 yg ready dari 3 kamar ! Such a bad experience with this sh*tty management hotel. Not even a single sorry from the staffs, Putra the reception failed to make my anger goes away liat mukanya bikin tambah kesel sungguh.

text:
Akhirnya dalam masa Pandemi ini kami berkesempatan untuk menginap di Bogor dengan Voucher dari Traveloka, dan pilihan kami adalah Deluxe Queen di Savero Style Hotel yg terletak didekat Kebun Raya Bogor serta rumah Walikota Bogor. 

Layanan Hotel secara umum sangat baik dan menyenangkan, serta telah menerapkan protokol kesehatan, serta dilengkapi mesin sanitizer automatic. 

Walapun parkir mobil termasuk kurang, namun saya melihat tamu masih dapat memarkirkan mobilnya dengan baik. 

Yang menurut saya istimewa adalah makanan, karena saya mengincipi menu buffee dinner yang cukup murah namun rasa makanannya sangat luar biasa, termasuk sarapannya. Semuanya enak-enak dan tidak terkesan asal jadi. 

Sedikit koreksi dari saya adalah antrian lobby agar tamu yang antri check in diluar tetap dijaga social distancingnya. 

Lalu masalah kebisingan di kamar yg menurut saya cukup menggangu karena suara mobil, motor bahkan kamar sebelah menghidupkan air masih terdengar jelas. 

Semoga tingkat kebisingan kamar dapat diredam dengan baik kedepannya. 

Thanks Savero Style...

text:
Well, this is my second hotel-visit in pandemic but in my opinion, this is the first time I visit a good health protocol hotel. In entrance, you will had temperature test. Mask and gloves are 'new uniform' for their staffs so we will feel more secure. After passing the test, you will have your another protocol: wash hands. This is also cool because it is provided by unique hand washing bowl, and also the hand dryer. Then, there are queue lines to protect your safety distance, both in receptionist and elevator.

Food is served by staffs, for security reason. Well, I miss to have buffet for lunch but for our healthy reason, this also good way by the hotel. Not only lunch but also snack time, so you can stay sit and enjoy :)

The hotel itself is located in a good position, in heart of Bogor near Kebun Raya. Unfortunately I not spent my night here because still insecure to stay too longer outside house haha. But I think, it will be comfort to stay here, both for meeting and staying. 

Good way to have your staycation here. Or holding some year end meetings, would be good idea too. Well there are no place is really safe from the pandemic, but as long as we can stay safe, we hope we gonna be alright. Keep travelling :)
title: First Visit in Pandemic

text:
I had booked the hotel as part of a deal for my birthday occasion, I couldn’t have been happier with the service they were provided. 

Savero Style Bogor is such a amazing hotel with staff that aims to make your stay as comfortable as can be. Every staff in the hotel is warm, sincere, hospitable and goes an extra mile to accommodate you to their best effort. The design of the rooms may not be liked by all but rest assurred, it is luxurious with a super comfortable bed, plenty of pillows, plush towels, & ample storage for your belongings.

The hospitality shown by the team Mr. Oky, Mr. Nando and Ms. Bella is worth a mention and did not surprise me with such high standards in customer service. They were served my family and I very well and also involved in giving the surprise birthday cake. You guys are awesome !! Keep it up, Savero Style Hotel Bogor!!
title: Best hotel in Town!

text:
I decided to go to savero style in bogor while new normal (covid-19), savero style is very good they thread me very well, the room and food as well . the staff very good and helpfull
Ill be back for sure!!
Thank you saverooooo ♥️♥️
title: first impressions

text:
The hotel building is fresh new. The reception service is top notch! Quick check in and check out with amazing hospitality! Quite a downside is the parking area is so limited for now.

The room is quite spacious for a budget hotel. But the bathroom and toilet area are a bit narrow. The cleanliness are good, i hope they can maintain this for a longtime. The bed and pillows are comfortable to make me sleep fast and your sense of gravity lost over the bed. But i hope they provide more queen bed rooms since it was so limited. The TV Channel also terrific for budget hotels!

The food also good. They have ready to take ommelete on breakfast! (Rare for two stars). The variety is also above average for two stars! But i hope they put more staffs on the table since so many guests does not working their own covid-19 safety protocol.

They have hidden gem! The rooftop with beautiful sight! Next time i hope i can bring my tripod there and enjoy the sunset with the bogor breeze.. or maybe the hotel can make it like a bit cozy place over there? It's like wasted lot with big potential...

100% will come back for staycation!
I hope i can get a chance to stay at their grand deluxe room at 8/9th floor!
title: Nice Little Budget Hotel at the heart of Bogor!

text:
A little story from me, a worker who's doing work from home ... It feels very boring if from day to day working at home alone ... but in the midst of a pandemic like this, it's weird if we travel out of the house ... but Hotel Savero Style Bogor answers all my worries ... this is a hotel where I can stay without having to worry about the cleanliness and sterility of the place ... everything is maintained well ...
Thank you to Pak Asep who kept my room clean ... and also to Pak Nando who helped me to reserve a room ...
and to the waitress incharge on thursday June 18th 2020 at the restaurant who recommended today's promo to me (forgot her name) ... I really didn't expect to taste hotel food at very affordable prices, but still very tasty ...
I highly recommend Savero Style Bogor Hotel to be a good destination to stay or to unwind from working at home in a pandemic like this ... I think i''ll be back soon... :)

Incheckningen gick smidigt. Ett välfungerande wifi, hotellet låg bra till och nära till apotek,  McDonalds och Burger King för de som inte kan vara utan det😊. 

Frächa handdukar och välstädat och en mkt serviceminded personal.

Ett litet minus i kanten det fanns bara ett vägguttag, inga vattenflaskor på rummet, inga tops inte heller någon kam. Brukar finnas på 4 ⭐⭐⭐⭐ hotell.
title: Avbrott i vardagen
